author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Eel With Horseradish & Beetroot recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Smoked Eel With Horseradish & Beetroot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g smoked eel, cut into small diagonal slices

recipeInstructions.text: Mix 1 tbs grated or horseradish cream into 3 tbs of crème fraîche with salt and black pepper to taste, adding a little mustard if necessary. Cut 200g smoked eel into small diagonal slices. Peel and grate 1 raw beetroot and mix with 1/2 tbs red wine vinegar. Top each oatcake with 1/2 tsp of horseradish cream, a few slices of smoked eel, some marinated beetroot, a little lemon zest, black pepper, and chervil or dill.
